default.name: General
default.description: The general settings for the server

IS_LOADING.help: Internal use : set to yes when BW is loading.
IS_LOADING.label: internal use loading
IS_LOADING.name: internal use loading

popovers.text: Internal use : set to yes when BW is loading.

NGINX_PREFIX.help: Where nginx will search for configurations.
NGINX_PREFIX.label: nginx prefix
NGINX_PREFIX.name: nginx prefix

popovers.text: Where nginx will search for configurations.

HTTP_PORT.help: HTTP port number which bunkerweb binds to.
HTTP_PORT.label: HTTP port
HTTP_PORT.name: HTTP port

popovers.text: HTTP port number which bunkerweb binds to.

HTTPS_PORT.help: HTTPS port number which bunkerweb binds to.
HTTPS_PORT.label: HTTPS port
HTTPS_PORT.name: HTTPS port

popovers.text: HTTPS port number which bunkerweb binds to.

SERVER_NAME.help: List of the virtual hosts served by bunkerweb.
SERVER_NAME.label: Server name
SERVER_NAME.name: Server name

popovers.text: List of the virtual hosts served by bunkerweb.

WORKER_RLIMIT_NOFILE.help: Maximum number of open files for worker processes.
WORKER_RLIMIT_NOFILE.label: Open files per worker
WORKER_RLIMIT_NOFILE.name: Open files per worker

popovers.text: Maximum number of open files for worker processes.

WORKER_CONNECTIONS.help: Maximum number of connections per worker.
WORKER_CONNECTIONS.label: Connections per worker
WORKER_CONNECTIONS.name: Connections per worker

popovers.text: Maximum number of connections per worker.

LOG_FORMAT.help: The format to use for access logs.
LOG_FORMAT.label: Log format
LOG_FORMAT.name: Log format

popovers.text: The format to use for access logs.

LOG_LEVEL.help: The level to use for error logs.
LOG_LEVEL.label: Log level
LOG_LEVEL.name: Log level

popovers.text: The level to use for error logs.

DNS_RESOLVERS.help: DNS addresses of resolvers to use.
DNS_RESOLVERS.label: DNS resolvers
DNS_RESOLVERS.name: DNS resolvers

popovers.text: DNS addresses of resolvers to use.

USE_API.help: Activate the API to control BunkerWeb.
USE_API.label: Activate API
USE_API.name: Activate API

popovers.text: Activate the API to control BunkerWeb.

API_HTTP_PORT.help: Listen port number for the API.
API_HTTP_PORT.label: API port number
API_HTTP_PORT.name: API port number

popovers.text: Listen port number for the API.

API_LISTEN_IP.help: Listen IP address for the API.
API_LISTEN_IP.label: API listen IP
API_LISTEN_IP.name: API listen IP

popovers.text: Listen IP address for the API.

API_SERVER_NAME.help: Server name (virtual host) for the API.
API_SERVER_NAME.label: API server name
API_SERVER_NAME.name: API server name

popovers.text: Server name (virtual host) for the API.

API_WHITELIST_IP.help: List of IP/network allowed to contact the API.
API_WHITELIST_IP.label: API whitelist IP
API_WHITELIST_IP.name: API whitelist IP

popovers.text: List of IP/network allowed to contact the API.

IS_DRAFT.help: Internal use : set to yes when the service is in draft mode.
IS_DRAFT.label: internal use draft
IS_DRAFT.name: internal use draft

popovers.text: Internal use : set to yes when the service is in draft mode.

BUNKERWEB_INSTANCES.help: List of BunkerWeb instances separated with spaces (format : fqdn-or-ip:5000 http://fqdn-or-ip:5000)
BUNKERWEB_INSTANCES.label: BunkerWeb instances
BUNKERWEB_INSTANCES.name: BunkerWeb instances

popovers.text: List of BunkerWeb instances separated with spaces (format : fqdn-or-ip:5000 http://fqdn-or-ip:5000)

default.name: Antibot
default.description: Bot detection by using a challenge.

ANTIBOT_URI.help: Unused URI that clients will be redirected to to solve the challenge.
ANTIBOT_URI.label: Antibot URL
ANTIBOT_URI.name: Antibot URL

popovers.text: Unused URI that clients will be redirected to to solve the challenge.

ANTIBOT_TIME_RESOLVE.help: Maximum time (in seconds) clients have to resolve the challenge. Once this time has passed, a new challenge will be generated.
ANTIBOT_TIME_RESOLVE.label: Time to resolve
ANTIBOT_TIME_RESOLVE.name: Time to resolve

popovers.text: Maximum time (in seconds) clients have to resolve the challenge. Once this time has passed, a new challenge will be generated.

ANTIBOT_TIME_VALID.help: Maximum validity time of solved challenges. Once this time has passed, clients will need to resolve a new one.
ANTIBOT_TIME_VALID.label: Time valid
ANTIBOT_TIME_VALID.name: Time valid

popovers.text: Maximum validity time of solved challenges. Once this time has passed, clients will need to resolve a new one.

ANTIBOT_RECAPTCHA_SCORE.help: Minimum score required for reCAPTCHA challenge.
ANTIBOT_RECAPTCHA_SCORE.label: reCAPTCHA score
ANTIBOT_RECAPTCHA_SCORE.name: reCAPTCHA score

popovers.text: Minimum score required for reCAPTCHA challenge.

default.name: Auth basic
default.description: Enforce login before accessing a resource or the whole site using HTTP basic auth method.

AUTH_BASIC_LOCATION.help: URL of the protected resource or sitewide value.
AUTH_BASIC_LOCATION.label: Auth basic Location
AUTH_BASIC_LOCATION.name: Auth basic Location

popovers.text: URL of the protected resource or sitewide value.

default.name: Backup
default.description: Backup your data to a custom location. Ensure the safety and availability of your important files by creating regular backups.

USE_BACKUP.help: Enable or disable the backup feature
USE_BACKUP.label: Activate automatic backup
USE_BACKUP.name: Activate automatic backup

popovers.text: Enable or disable the backup feature

BACKUP_SCHEDULE.help: The frequency of the backup (daily, weekly or monthly)
BACKUP_SCHEDULE.label: Backup schedule
BACKUP_SCHEDULE.name: Backup schedule

popovers.text: The frequency of the backup (daily, weekly or monthly)

BACKUP_ROTATION.help: The number of backups to keep
BACKUP_ROTATION.label: Backup rotation
BACKUP_ROTATION.name: Backup rotation

popovers.text: The number of backups to keep

BACKUP_DIRECTORY.help: The directory where the backup will be stored
BACKUP_DIRECTORY.label: Backup directory
BACKUP_DIRECTORY.name: Backup directory

popovers.text: The directory where the backup will be stored

default.name: Bad behavior
default.description: Ban IP generating too much 'bad' HTTP status code in a period of time.

BAD_BEHAVIOR_STATUS_CODES.help: List of HTTP status codes considered as 'bad'.
BAD_BEHAVIOR_STATUS_CODES.label: Bad status codes
BAD_BEHAVIOR_STATUS_CODES.name: Bad status codes

popovers.text: List of HTTP status codes considered as 'bad'.

BAD_BEHAVIOR_THRESHOLD.help: Maximum number of 'bad' HTTP status codes within the period of time before IP is banned.
BAD_BEHAVIOR_THRESHOLD.label: Threshold
BAD_BEHAVIOR_THRESHOLD.name: Threshold

popovers.text: Maximum number of 'bad' HTTP status codes within the period of time before IP is banned.

BAD_BEHAVIOR_COUNT_TIME.help: Period of time (in seconds) during which we count 'bad' HTTP status codes.
BAD_BEHAVIOR_COUNT_TIME.label: Period (in seconds)
BAD_BEHAVIOR_COUNT_TIME.name: Period (in seconds)

popovers.text: Period of time (in seconds) during which we count 'bad' HTTP status codes.

BAD_BEHAVIOR_BAN_TIME.help: The duration time (in seconds) of a ban when the corresponding IP has reached the threshold.
BAD_BEHAVIOR_BAN_TIME.label: Ban duration (in seconds)
BAD_BEHAVIOR_BAN_TIME.name: Ban duration (in seconds)

popovers.text: The duration time (in seconds) of a ban when the corresponding IP has reached the threshold.

default.name: Brotli
default.description: Compress HTTP requests with the brotli algorithm.

BROTLI_TYPES.default: application/atom+xml application/javascript application/json application/rss+xml application/vnd.ms-fontobject application/x-font-opentype application/x-font-truetype application/x-font-ttf application/x-javascript application/xhtml+xml application/xml font/eot font/opentype font/otf font/truetype image/svg+xml image/vnd.microsoft.icon image/x-icon image/x-win-bitmap text/css text/javascript text/plain text/xml

BROTLI_COMP_LEVEL.label: Compression level
BROTLI_COMP_LEVEL.name: Compression level

popovers.text: The compression level of the brotli algorithm.

CORS_ALLOW_ORIGIN.name: Allowed origins

default.name: Client cache

USE_CLIENT_CACHE.name: Use client cache

popovers.text: Tell client to store locally static files.

CLIENT_CACHE_CONTROL.name: Cache-Control header

default.name: Headers

REMOVE_HEADERS.label: Remove headers
